title: Can anybody help identify this?
content:
It's from the children's book Caps for Sale by Esphyr Slobodkina

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131018081514im_/http:/typophile.com/files/font_4451.jpg)
author: hannahp5

comments.content: Hey I am looking for this font from the children's book Caps For Sale by Esphyr Slobodkina

Fuzzy image, serif details ambiguous. Anyway, it's a condensed Bodoni. Choice of several with minor variation in detail. A well designed one is R.H. Middleton's [Bodoni Campanile](http://web.archive.org/web/20131018081514/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/redrooster/bodoni-rr-campanile/) for Ludlow 1936 as digitized by Red Rooster, also available from Bitstream as [Modern 735](http://web.archive.org/web/20131018081514/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/bitstream/modern-735/).  
Don
